body:
This PR addresses various `mypy` errors found during pre-commit checks.
1.  **Configuration**: Fixed `mypy.ini` syntax for `exclude` and added `explicit_package_bases = True`.
2.  **Scripts**:
    *   `scripts/shared/assessment_utils.py`: Added check for `node.end_lineno is not None`.
    *   `scripts/analyze_completist_data.py`: Added type annotation for `counts`.
    *   `scripts/run_assessment.py`: Added annotations for `python_files`, `test_files`, and handled `score` initialization logic.
    *   `scripts/generate_assessment_summary.py`: Added explicit casts for `weight` calculations.
3.  **Game Logic**:
    *   Added `health` and `alive` (and `pitch` for Force Field) type hints to `Player` classes to resolve attribute errors.

All tests passed locally.

---
*PR created automatically by Jules for task [21806197745990080](https://jules.google.com/task/21806197745990080) started by @dieterolson*

title: Fix mypy configuration and type issues
